data.name: Vertigo
data.description: An everyday card with a low annual card fee and purchase rate

features.additionalInfo: Up to 55 days Interest free on purchases when you pay the Closing Balance (or the Monthly Payment Balance with a balance transfer) on time.

Multiple ways to pay, securely, with mobile wallet. Pay on the go simply and securely from your mobile device at millions of stores worldwide, where contactless payments are accepted - compatible with Apple Pay.

Multiple ways to pay, securely, with mobile wallet. Pay on the go simply and securely from your mobile device at millions of stores worldwide, where contactless payments are accepted - compatible with Google Pay.

Multiple ways to pay, securely, with mobile wallet. Pay on the go simply and securely from your mobile device at millions of stores worldwide, where contactless payments are accepted - compatible with Samsung Pay.

An extra card : For an additional cardholder aged 16 or over at no extra cost, provided the account isn't a joint account. Additional card transactions are the responsibility of the primary account holder.

0% p.a. interest on balance transfers for 28 months. 1% balance transfer fee applies. Based on your requirements your can either choose cashback offer or the balance transfer offer. Consider this card with the cashback offer if you would like to be rewarded for your supermarket spend. Consider this card with the balance transfer offer if you are looking to save monthly interest and pay off your credit card balances faster.

10% cashback on supermarket and petrol spend, capped at $400, plus 6.99% p.a. interest on balance transfers for 12 months when requested at card application. The variable cash advance rate will apply after this promotional period. Spend within 180 days from card approval. Based on your requirements your can either choose cashback offer or the balance transfer offer. Consider this card with the cashback offer if you would like to be rewarded for your supermarket and petrol spend. Consider this card with the balance transfer offer if you are looking to save monthly interest and pay off your credit card balances faster.
Phone and Internet Banking

features.additionalValue: SMS and email alerts are available for the product

features.additionalInfo: Feel confident using our cards, with 24/7 fraud monitoring, Secure Online Shopping Service, and the Bank of Melbourne Fraud Money Back Guarantee.
The product includes extra repayment features.
The product includes fraud protection features.
The product includes instalment plans.

You can use your Card to make a Purchase or a Cash Advance or carry out a Balance Transfer from another Credit Card. You can use your Card in many places in Australia and around the world. Look for the Visa and Mastercard signs that match those shown on your Card. If your Card is accepted by a Merchant, branch or ATM provider you can use it to: Pay for Purchases, through payment terminals, e.g. at a shop, etc.  online, within a mobile app, by telephone,  through mail order Withdraw Cash, at an ATM,  at a Bank branch.
Recurring payments - You may authorise a Merchant to charge recurring payments to your Card automatically without requesting your authorisation on each occasion

Confirming and authorising transactions :  There are a number of ways you may be able to confirm a transaction. These include: signing your name. Holding your Card in  front of a contactless payment device. Entering your PIN. Entering your Card details and any other information required.
Gambling blocks : If you wish to limit access to gambling services through the Card Account, please call us or log into your online banking and activate gambling block in the Card Services menu.

Statements : We will issue a statement for the Card Account to you every month unless the account has a balance of $10 or less and there has been no account activity in that month. You can choose to receive statements by mail or electronically.

Plan&Pay : A Plan&Pay is an instalment plan that helps you split a large eligible Purchase and part or all of your Credit Card balance into manageable instalments. When you set up a Plan&Pay your Card Account balance will be split into: a Plan&Pay Balance ? this will include all of your active Plan&Pays, your Main Account Balance, which is made up of any remaining amounts.
Access to My Offers Hub : My Offers Hub is a collection of offers and discounts available to eligible debit or credit cardholders to thank you for being our customer.
Autopay facility is available. With Autopay, you can choose to pay off your Minimum Payment Due or your full closing balance each month.
Customers can access their eligible Bank of Melbourne cards and Apple?s ID&V security features within Apple Wallet. T&Cs apply.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Should have permanent residency in Australia/NZ OR  is a non-resident or migrant and hold an acceptable Visa, with a minimum 1 year before expiry
Should have a regular, verifiable Australian taxable income
Should have a fixed, verifiable residential address in Australia.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the Australian dollar value for transactions with merchants based overseas

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $15.00 once per statement period if your credit card account was opened before 4 June 2012. No overlimit fee will be charged for personal credit card accounts opened on or after 4 June 2012.

fees.name: Copy of a deposit or withdrawal form
Balance Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. interest on balance transfers for 28 months. 1% balance transfer fee applies. Based on your requirements your can either choose cashback offer or the balance transfer offer. Consider this card with the cashback offer if you would like to be rewarded for your supermarket spend.
